EmailTemplate.name: Network Partner Case Creation From Email to Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Created Reference Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sender,
Thank you for sending us the query.
We would endeavour to come back to you within 48 hours.
Here is the case number assigned to this query : {!Case.CaseNumber}.
For any updates to this particular query, please add your query to this email and forward it to businesspartner@auspost.com.au.
You can also check out our Business Partner Self Help Portal here, which may also support in resolving your query.
Once signed in you can access this page at any time and find relevant policies, information and updates to support you and your team.
Kind regards, Network Partners Query Management and Support team {!Case.Thread_Id}
